refnamediv.refpurpose: traces path to a network host

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Description can be found in traceroute8, all the references to IP replaced to IPv6. It is needless to copy the description from there.

refsect1.title: HISTORY
refsect1.para: This program has long history. Author of traceroute is Van Jacobson and it first appeared in 1988. This clone is based on a port of traceroute to IPv6 published in NRL IPv6 distribution in 1996. In turn, it was ported to Linux by Pedro Roque. After this it was kept in sync by Alexey Kuznetsov kuznet@ms2.inr.ac.ru. And eventually entered iputils package.

refsect1.title: SECURITY
refsect1.para: tracepath6 requires CAP_NET_RAW capability to be executed. It is safe to be used as set-uid root.

refsect1.title: AVAILABILITY
refsect1.para: traceroute6 is part of iputils package and the latest versions are available in source form at http://www.skbuff.net/iputils/iputils-current.tar.bz2.
